docs.text: i have to say it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tim burton's retelling of planet of the apes is more fun than a barrel of monkeys .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ok , that's off my chest .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: no more monkey puns , i promise .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: seriously , though , planet of the apes is one rip-roarin' summer outing , filled with thrills , action , adventure , wit and bits of funny ( dare i say , monkey ) business .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i know , i know , i promised .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and for those film buffs who are fond of the original , burton's version includes a couple tips of the hat to that movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mark wahlberg stars as capt . leo davidson , a deep-space pilot whose ship gets drawn into a magnetic field and hurled into the future .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he crash lands on a planet where apes are the dominant species and humans are hunted , captured and sold into slavery .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: despite being darker than the original , burton's film is not as heavy handed nor as sanctimonious .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some of the movie's flashes of humor are surreal as well as typically burton : an organ-grinder ape with a midget or an elderly ape taking off a wig and removing false teeth as he prepares for bed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: then there are the parents who buy a little girl as a pet for there young daughter .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the seller advises the parents to get rid of the girl before she reaches puberty : " one thing you don't want in your house is a human teen-ager , " he says .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: you don't have to be an ape to realize the truth in that statement .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: touches such as these are what stamps this movie with burton's brand .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: lines that hearken back to the original movie are sprinkled throughout : the first words spoken by an ape to davidson as the astronaut is regaining consciousness and grabs the simian's foot to try righting himself are : " take your stinking hand off of me , you damned , dirty human . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: anyone familiar with the first version of the film will , of course , recognize the irony in that piece of dialogue .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: another of burton's in-jokes is to have charlton heston , star of the original , play the chimpanzee father of tim roth's gen . thade .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the young chimp goes to visit his dying father .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: both have one thing in common , a hatred of humans .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with his dying breath , the elder spews out his vile : " damn them , damn them all to hell , " he says before expiring .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: that is the famous line heston's taylor shouted at the conclusion of the original after discovering the planet's terrible secret .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the performances throughout are top-notch .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: wahlberg plays davidson not as some gung-ho hero , but as a confused and somewhat frightened explorer who only wants to return home .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he is reluctant to lead the human rebellion ; his only objective being to find a way off this upside-down planet .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this hesitation is what makes his character believable and vulnerable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: roth is ferocious , cunning , cruel and savage as the fascist chimp who wants to rid his planet of all vestiges of humanity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he leaps and bounds as if he had springs on his feet .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is a masterful turn .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: helena bonham carter is ari , the chimp who believes that apes and humans can live in peace and as equals .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: hers is a smart , compassionate characterization .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: michael clarke duncan is big and brutal as attar the gorilla aid to thade who blindly follows his leader until his faith is shaken .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a fine comic outing is given by paul giamatti as limbo , the ape slave trader making a living off the misery of the humans he captures .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the battle between apes and humans looms , the cowardly limbo pleads , " can't we all just get along , " echoing the words of rodney king .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: much of the success of planet of the apes goes to burton's technical crew , especially production designer rick heinrichs and the legendary rick baker who created the ape makeup .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: burton's musical collaborator , danny elfman , provides another fine score , though it is not as memorable as his work on batman or sleepy hollow .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie's only letdown comes at the very end where burton tries to outshock the finale from the 1968 original .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he comes close , but falls short .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: otherwise , planet of the apes is what a summer movie should be : an amusement park ride filled with lots of action , stunts and a few laughs .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is one feature in which the expectations lived up to the pre-release hype .
docs.label: positive
